title: Create a Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
description: For a new residential home project, a PM needs to create an initial Work Breakdown Structure (WBS).

tasks.description: Create the top-level WBS elements: 'Design', 'Pre-Construction', 'Construction', and 'Closeout'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The main phases of the project are created as the top level of the WBS.

tasks.description: Under the 'Construction' element, add the sub-elements: 'Foundations', 'Framing', 'MEP', and 'Finishes'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The 'Construction' phase is broken down into its major components.
